🎨 Themes

🧵

Flatwork Ironers

Safety, adjustments, and maintenance

📖 Manual 🛠 Parts 🚨 Troubleshooting

Daily Checklist

  • Verify emergency stops and guards
  • Inspect ribbons/belts for wear and tracking
  • Check steam traps for leaks and proper function
  • Surface temperature even across width

Operating Specs

Steam Pressure80 PSI
Bed Temp330°F
Speed25 FPM

Adjustments

  • Level the bed; verify parallelism to rolls
  • Set roll spring pressure to OEM spec
  • Align feed ribbons to avoid drift
  • Balance exhaust airflow left/right

Troubleshooting

Uneven Finish
  • Check roll pressure springs
  • Verify bed temperature profile
  • Adjust ribbon tracking
Browning/Scorching
  • Reduce bed temperature
  • Verify moisture at feed
  • Increase speed

Wiring Diagram
